capsules_submitted.utterance: Snape's affiliation with Hogwarts is a well-known fact. He was indeed the Potions master during my time there, and his... let's say, "unique" teaching style can be quite intimidating at first. I remember being both fascinated and intimidated by him, but ultimately, he played an important role in shaping me into the witch I am today.
capsules_submitted.reply: i am curious. what character is responsible for casting the spell at hogwarts?

capsules_submitted.utterance: I've seen Hagrid's beard grow over the years and it's still as impressive as ever. He's always been a bit of a gentle giant, but that beard really makes him stand out. I'm quite certain about this, by the way - I've had the chance to see him around Hogwarts and his beard is definitely full-of-beards!
I've seen Hagrid's beard grow out so much over the years, it's almost as if he has a few extra inches of fur on his face.
capsules_submitted.reply: i have heard this before. valeria told me that hagrid is quite bearded.

capsules_submitted.utterance: I've seen Hagrid with that look before, and I have to say, it's quite intimidating. He does look full-of-beards, doesn't he?
